content.question: Write a code segment that prints "Acceptable" if beadSequence adheres to all three rules and prints "Not acceptable" otherwise. You must use the variables lengthGood, correctColors, and startEndGood to receive full credit, regardless of what you wrote for parts A, B, and C.

frqParts.text: Write a code segment that prints "Acceptable" if beadSequence adheres to all three rules and prints "Not acceptable" otherwise. You must use the variables lengthGood, correctColors, and startEndGood to receive full credit, regardless of what you wrote for parts A, B, and C.

skill.text: 2.A: Write program code to implement an algorithm.
